data.name: Visual Novel Maker - Welcome to My Nightmare
data.detailed_description:
Have you been worried about your game’s music being too cheery and upbeat for the story’s tone? Then it’s time to check out the Darkest Hour music pack! ayato sound create’s newest pack contains 20 tracks to give your game the right background music for your moodier scenes.

Features:

* 20 songs
* ogg, mp3, m4a, wav, and looping ogg file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

data.short_description: Freaky spooky and haunted music to bring your nightmares to life!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
